definition: Midlatitude Ionospheric Trough Boundaries and Minima derived from TEC
description: Midlatitude Ionospheric Trough Boundaries and Minima derived from TEC
variables_table:
Variable,Units,Description,Dim,Type
Timestamp, ,"Time of observation, UTC",1,CDF_EPOCH
Counter,,Swarm orbit counter and quarter orbit (four per Swarm orbit) counter that are based on magnetic coordinates as defined in [AD-2] (Sect. 4.1.2.2),2,CDF_UINT4
Latitude,deg,Position of the MIT minimum in ITRF - Geocentric latitude,1,CDF_DOUBLE
Longitude,deg,Position of the MIT minimum in ITRF - Geocentric longitude,1,CDF_DOUBLE
Radius,m,Position of the MIT minimum in ITRF - Geocentric radius (from the Earth center),1,CDF_DOUBLE
Latitude_QD,deg,QD latitude of the MIT minimum,1,CDF_DOUBLE
Longitude_QD,deg,QD longitude of the MIT minimum,1,CDF_DOUBLE
MLT,h,Magnetic Local Time of MIT minimum,1,CDF_DOUBLE
L_value,,L-value of the MIT minimum,1,CDF_DOUBLE
SZA,deg,Solar zenith angle of the MIT minimum,1,CDF_DOUBLE
TEC,TECU,Total electron content of the MIT minimum,1,CDF_DOUBLE
Depth,1/cm^3,Depth of the MIT,1,CDF_DOUBLE
DR,%,Relative change in density within the MIT,1,CDF_DOUBLE
Width,deg,Width of the MIT calculated from QD latitudes,1,CDF_DOUBLE
dL,,Width of the MIT calculated from L-values,1,CDF_DOUBLE
PW_Gradient,TECU/deg),Change in TEC at the poleward wall of the MIT divided by QD latitude difference,1,CDF_DOUBLE
EW_Gradient,TECU/deg),Change in TEC at the equatorward wall of the MIT divided by QD latitude difference,1,CDF_DOUBLE
Quality,,Characterizes the detection quality of the MIT as a whole,8,CDF_INT1
Timestamp_ID, ,"Vector of times of observation, UTC",4,CDF_EPOCH
Latitude_ID,deg,Vector of Positions in ITRF - Geocentric latitude,4,CDF_DOUBLE
Longitude_ID,deg,Vector of Positions in ITRF - Geocentric longitude,4,CDF_DOUBLE
Radius_ID,m,Vector of Positions in ITRF - Geocentric radius (from the Earth centre),4,CDF_DOUBLE
Latitude_QD_ID,deg,Vector of QD latitudes,4,CDF_DOUBLE
Longitude_QD_ID,deg,Vector of QD longitudes,4,CDF_DOUBLE
MLT_ID,h,Vector of Magnetic Local Times,4,CDF_DOUBLE
L_value_ID,,Vector of L-values in Earth radii,4,CDF_DOUBLE
SZA_ID,deg,Vector of solar zenith angles,4,CDF_DOUBLE
TEC_ID,TECU,Vector of TEC values,4,CDF_DOUBLE
Position_Quality_ID,,Vector of quality indicators characterizing the detection quality of each single positions,4,CDF_INT1
related_resources: • Activity: Plasmapause Related boundaries in the topside Ionosphere as derived from Swarm Measurements (PRISM)
